mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zzupzzup.MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_ROLE, PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, LOGIN_TYPE, AGE_RANGE, GENDER, PROFILE_IMAGE, NICKNAME, STATUS_MESSAGE) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{memberRole}, #{password}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{loginType}, #{ageRange}, #{gender}, #{profileImage}, #{nickname}, #{statusMessage})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, AGE_RANGE, GENDER, PROFILE_IMAGE, NICKNAME, STATUS_MESSAGE, ACTIVITY_SCORE, MANNER_SCORE, REG_DATE, DELETE_DATE, DELETE_TYPE, BLACKLIST_REG_DATE FROM zzupzzup.MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_ROLE = 'user'

SELECT zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_PHONE, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.PROFILE_IMAGE, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.NICKNAME, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.STATUS_MESSAGE, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.REG_DATE, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.DELETE_DATE, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.DELETE_TYPE, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.BLACKLIST_REG_DATE, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.MEMBER_ID, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.RESTAURANT_NAME, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.JUDGE_STATUS, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.RESTAURANT_REG_DATE, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.REQUEST_DATE, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.JUDGE_DATE FROM zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER WHERE zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.MEMBER_ID = zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID AND zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ROLE = 'owner' AND zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
